channel.title: [Tutorial] How to fix the Coockroaches Crevice [718]
channel.description:
[u][b]AlRS Tutorials[/b][/u]
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/94482740/Photos/crevice.png[/img]
1.Open the ObjectHandler.java and add this code:
[CODE] //Coockroaches else if (id == 29728) //object id of the Crevice player.useStairs(-1, new WorldTile(3158, 4280, 3), 0, 1); else if (id == 29729) //object id of the Rope player.useStairs(-1, new WorldTile(3075, 3462, 0), 0, 1); else if (id == 29671) //object id of an stair player.useStairs(-1, new WorldTile(3174, 4273, 2), 0, 1); else if (id == 29672) //object id of an other stair player.useStairs(-1, new WorldTile(3171, 4271, 3), 0, 1); else if (id == 29667) //object id of an other stair player.useStairs(-1, new WorldTile(3160, 4249, 1), 0, 1); else if (id == 29668) //object id of an other stair player.useStairs(-1, new WorldTile(3157, 4251, 2), 0, 1); [/CODE] That looks like this: [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/94482740/Photos/code.png[/img]
2. Compile. And now the Crevise and some more works.
Next tutorial: [u][b]How to add Control Panel[/b][/u] comming soon.

item.title: [Tutorial] How to fix the Coockroaches Crevice [718]
item.dc:creator: @AlterOPSnet AlterOPSnet
item.description:
@AlterOPSnet wrote:

AlRS Tutorials

1.Open the ObjectHandler.java and add this code:

				//Coockroaches
				else if (id == 29728) //object id of the Crevice
					player.useStairs(-1, new WorldTile(3158, 4280, 3), 0, 1);
				else if (id == 29729) //object id of the Rope
					player.useStairs(-1, new WorldTile(3075, 3462, 0), 0, 1);
				else if (id == 29671) //object id of an stair
					player.useStairs(-1, new WorldTile(3174, 4273, 2), 0, 1);
				else if (id == 29672) //object id of an other stair
					player.useStairs(-1, new WorldTile(3171, 4271, 3), 0, 1);
				else if (id == 29667) //object id of an other stair
					player.useStairs(-1, new WorldTile(3160, 4249, 1), 0, 1);
				else if (id == 29668) //object id of an other stair
					player.useStairs(-1, new WorldTile(3157, 4251, 2), 0, 1);

That looks like this:

  1. Compile.
    And now the Crevise and some more works.

Next tutorial:
How to add Control Panel
comming soon.

Read full topic
